GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.12.5
GSD.description:
usb: typec: ucsi: Retrieve all the PDOs instead of just the first 4

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.12.5 by commit 5e9c6f58b01e6fdfbc740390c01f542a35c97e57, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit 992a60ed0d5e312ce9a485c9e12097ac82ae4b3e. For more details please see the references link.
